  <div class = "span5 main">
```{r results="asis", error = F, message = F, warning = F}
  require(rCharts)

  grid1 <- rCharts$new()
  grid1$field(
    "lib",
    "libraries/widgets/d3grid"
  )

  grid1$set(
    height = 500,
    width = 960,
    container = ".rChart",
    size = 400,
    nrow = 8,
    ncol = 8
  )
  grid1$print()
```
